Package org.shared.net.nio

A package for managed connections built on top of java.nio.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    NioConnection.WriteHandler
    Defines a handler for outgoing data.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    NioConnection
    An abstract asynchronous sockets class internally managed by NioManager.
    NioEvent<T>
    An internal event class for NioConnection and NioManager.
    NioManager
    A transparent, asynchronous sockets layer for easy network programming that performs readiness selection on NioConnections via callbacks.
    NioManagerDispatchThread
    A specialized NioManagerThread that dispatches newly created connections to NioManagerIoThreads.
    NioManagerIoThread
    A specialized NioManagerThread that reads from and writes to connections.
    NioManagerThread
    An abstract base class for NioManager service threads.
    NioManagerThread.Request<I,O>
    A subclass of FutureTask for signaling manager threads and retrieving their internal states.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    NioConnection.NioConnectionStatus
    An enumeration of connection states.
    NioEvent.NioEventType
    An enumeration of NioEvent types.
    NioManagerThread.NioManagerThreadStatus
    An enumeration of thread states.

Package org.shared.net.nio Description

A package for managed connections built on top of java.nio.
